title: VK API JSON Schema - objects
description: Contains JSON Schema documents explaining the VK.COM API - objects

autobidding_max_cost.description: Max cost of target actions for autobidding, kopecks

video.description: Information whether the ad is a video

image_src_2x.description: URL of the preview image in double size

preview_link.description: link to preview an ad as it is shown on the website

video.description: Information whether the ad is a video

ads_count.description: Amount of active ads in campaign

is_cbo_enabled.description: Shows if Campaign Budget Optimization is on

views_limit.description: Limit of views per user per campaign

paying.description: Information whether the user has proceeded VK payments before

create_time.description: Lookalike request create time, as Unixtime

update_time.description: Lookalike request update time, as Unixtime

scheduled_delete_time.description: Time by which lookalike request would be deleted, as Unixtime

source_retargeting_group_id.description: Retargeting group id, which was used as lookalike seed

source_name.description: Lookalike request seed name (retargeting group name)

level.description: Save audience level id, which is used in save audience queries

audience_count.description: Saved audience audience size for according level

original_id.description: Music artist ID as in VKMusic

recommended_cpc.description: Recommended CPC value for 50% reach (old format)

recommended_cpm.description: Recommended CPM value for 50% reach (old format)

lifetime.description: Number of days for user to be in group
